data.eml:eml: A new Palaearctic subgenus of genus Phytoecia Dejean, 1835 (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Danilevsky, Mikhail (2018): A new Palaearctic subgenus of genus Phytoecia Dejean, 1835 (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae). Zootaxa 4521 (1): 129-132, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4521.1.8
